name: ThisorThatTakeaTurn
0:
”Alexa, Open Take A Turn”
”Alexa, Start Take A Turn”
”Alexa, Play Take A Turn”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: take a turn
des:
Welcome to the game of THIS OR THAT.
A great way to learn a lot about another person is to give two choices – cats or dogs? Coffee or tea? Flying or swimming? Books or movies? Going out or staying in? This way, you’ll learn more about them and will find out if you have lots in common or not!

We have compiled lots of choices for you. So dig in. I hope you guys enjoyed it.

Say- Alexa, Play Take A Turn.

Here are the things you can say, once you initialize the skill.
Repeat/Say Again - To hear the question again
Help - To get detailed instructions

Good luck!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
